mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OneByOne(oneByOneNum , title, content,mail, filename, id,regdate ) values((SELECT NVL(MAX(oneByOneNum), 0) + 1 as oneByOneNum FROM OneByOne) ,#{title}, #{content}, #{mail}, #{filename}, #{id}, sysdate )
mapper.select:
select oneByOneNum, id, mail, title,content,regdate, r from( select oneByOneNum, id, mail, title,content,regdate, rownum r from( select oneByOneNum, id, mail, title,content,regdate from OneByOne
id like '%'||#{word}||'%'
mail like '%'||#{word}||'%'
title like '%'||#{word}||'%'
content like '%'||#{word}||'%'
ORDER BY oneByOneNum
) )
where r>=#{sno} and r<=#{eno}
